validation_criteria: The code changes in the output artifacts (`src/ai_whisperer/plan_runner.py`, `src/ai_whisperer/execution_engine.py`, `src/ai_whisperer/cli.py`) are consistent with the requirements outlined in `docs/runner_test_analysis.md`.
